armor.itemDescription: Priestly robes, the white has been stained and the edges are frayed and bitten by rats.
A set of tanned elk hide, held together with metal fasteners and stringy sinew.
An aged chain-mail shirt, riddled with battle scars and holes that clearly killed the last owner.
A breastplate adorned with aging metallic filigree. One feels an age-lost honor restored when worn.
A customized set of overlapping chain-mail and woven plates.
